content: In @Grahame Grieve 's wrap-up from the Connectathon, I think he mentioned that the v2 to FHIR track has made progress on some spreadsheets for mapping. I was unable to join the track, but would love to have a look at what was done. Is that available somewhere?

Have a look at the notes here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/Connectathon+-+v2-to-FHIR%3A+May+2019
while new spreadsheets are starting to be created per agreed to approach here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/Segment+Mapping
